# Government Tender Announcement
## *Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services*

### Description

The Government of Canada is seeking offers from eligible contractors to provide laundry and dry cleaning services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at various locations in 14 Wing Greenwood and Camp Aldershot, Kentville, NS. The services will be provided on an as-need basis.

### Key Information

* **Tender Reference:** WS3859960061
* **Closing Date:** May 26, 2023, at 14:00 hs (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Contract Period:** The Regional Individual Standing Offer will be for a period of three (3) years, with an option for two (2) 12-month extension periods.

### Bidder Eligibility and Requirements

* No security requirements are associated with this solicitation.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
* Bidders must make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### Evaluation Criteria

* The bid will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:**
 + Email: [matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 + Phone: Not provided

### Publication Information

* **Publication Date:** May 10, 2023
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16233201?extsite=MTYyMzMyMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Information

Please refer to the solicitation document for further details. The solicitation document is available on the linked webpage for the specific notice URL above.
